013package org.apache.juneau.http.remote;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import java.lang.reflect.*;
018import java.util.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
022
023/**
024 * Contains the meta-data about a remote proxy REST interface.
025 *
026 * <p>
027 * Captures the information in {@link Remote @Remote} annotations for caching and reuse.
028 *
029 * <ul class='seealso'>
030 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server.jrs.RestRpc">REST/RPC</a>
031 * </ul>
032 */
033public class RrpcInterfaceMeta {
034
035   private final Map<Method,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> methods;
036   private final Map<String,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> methodsByPath;
037   private final String path;
038   private final Class<?> c;
039
040   /**
041    * Constructor.
042    *
043    * @param c
044    *    The interface class annotated with a {@link Remote @Remote} annotation.
045    *    <br>Note that the annotations are optional.
046    * @param uri
047    *    The absolute URL of the remote REST interface that implements this proxy interface.
048    *    <br>This is only used on the client side.
049    */
050   public RrpcInterfaceMeta(Class<?> c, String uri) {
051      this.c = c;
052      Value<String> path = Value.of("");
053      ClassInfo ci = ClassInfo.of(c);
054
055      ci.forEachAnnotation(Remote.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.path()), x -> path.set(trimSlashes(x.path())));
056
057      Map<Method,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> methods = map();
058      ci.forEachPublicMethod(
059         x -> true,
060         x -> methods.put(x.inner(), new RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta(uri, x.inner()))
061      );
062
063      Map<String,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> methodsByPath = map();
064      methods.values().forEach(x -> methodsByPath.put(x.getPath(), x));
065
066      this.methods = unmodifiable(methods);
067      this.methodsByPath = unmodifiable(methodsByPath);
068      this.path = path.get();
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Returns a map of all methods on this interface proxy keyed by HTTP path.
073    *
074    * @return
075    *    A map of all methods on this remote interface keyed by HTTP path.
076    *    <br>The keys never have leading slashes.
077    *    <br>The map is never <jk>null</jk>.
078    */
079   public Map<String,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> getMethodsByPath() {
080      return methodsByPath;
081   }
082
083   /**
084    * Returns the metadata about the specified method on this interface proxy.
085    *
086    * @param m The method to look up.
087    * @return Metadata about the method or <jk>null</jk> if no metadata was found.
088    */
089   public RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta getMethodMeta(Method m) {
090      return methods.get(m);
091   }
092
093   /**
094    * Returns the metadata about the specified method on this interface proxy by the path defined on the method.
095    *
096    * @param p The HTTP path to look for.
097    * @return Metadata about the method or <jk>null</jk> if no metadata was found.
098    */
099   public RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta getMethodMetaByPath(String p) {
100      return methodsByPath.get(p);
101   }
102
103   /**
104    * Returns the Java class of this interface.
105    *
106    * @return
107    *    The Java class of this interface.
108    *    <br>Never <jk>null</jk>.
109    */
110   public Class<?> getJavaClass() {
111      return c;
112   }
113
114   /**
115    * Returns the HTTP path of this interface.
116    *
117    * @return
118    *    The HTTP path of this interface.
119    *    <br>Never <jk>null</jk>.
120    *    <br>Never has leading or trailing slashes.
121    */
122   public String getPath() {
123      return path;
124   }
125}
